data.name: SettingsPage_ThemeSelectorTooltip

data.name: MainWindow_AboutTooltip
data.value: Xenia Managerについての情報を表示します

data.name: MainWindow_ManageTooltip
data.value: インストールされたXeniaを管理します

data.name: MainWindow_SettingsTooltip
data.value: Xenia Managerの設定を開きます

data.name: MessageBox_RemoveGameContentText
data.value: Remove the content folder for {0}?\nThis will delete all installed title updates, save games, and related content.

data.name: MessageBox_AddGameWithDefaultArtworkText
data.value: Do you want to add the game with default box art? Press 'Yes' to proceed, or 'No' to cancel.

data.name: MessageBox_UnableFindSelectedGameTitle
data.value: 選択したゲームが見つかりませんでした

data.name: MessageBox_UnableFindSelectedGameText
data.value: 選択したゲームがデータベースに見つかりませんでした。\nデフォルトのアートワークで追加しますか（「はい」を押してください）または再試行します (「いいえ」を押してください)?

data.name: MessageBox_MissmatchedTitleIdTitle
data.value: タイトルIDが一致しません

data.name: MessageBox_MissmatchedTitleIdText
data.value: Detected Title ID ({0}) doesn't match selected game ({1}).\nContinue anyway?

data.name: SnackbarPresenter_XeniaUpdateAvailableTitle
data.value: Xenia に新しいアップデートがあります。

data.name: SnackbarPresenter_XeniaUpdateAvailableText
data.value: 「管理」ページを開き、これらのXeniaバージョンを新しいバージョンに更新します。

data.name: LibraryGameButton_InstallPatches
data.value: パッチのインストール

data.name: LibraryGameButton_DownloadPatches
data.value: パッチをダウンロード

data.name: LibraryGameButton_InstallContent
data.value: コンテンツをインストール

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ViewInstalledContent
data.value: インストール済みのコンテンツを表示

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ShortcutMenuText
data.value: ショートカットを作成

data.name: LibraryGameButton_LocationMenuText
data.value: エミュレータとゲームパス

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioMaxQueuedFramesSettingText
data.value: キューに入れられた最大フレーム

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioMaxQueuedFramesSettingTooltip
data.value: Allows changing max buffered audio frames to reduce audio delay NOTE: Minimum is 4

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioMuteSettingTooltip
data.value: 全てのオーディオ出力をミュート

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioXmpSettingTooltip
data.value: Enables Music Player playback This can fix music in some games

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioUseDedicatedXmaThreadSettingTooltip
data.value: 別スレッド でXMAデコードを有効にします。このオプションを無効にすると、より良い結果が期待されますが、パフォーマンスは低下します。

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioXmaDecoderSettingText
data.value: XMAオーディオデコーダ (実験的)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioXmaDecoderSettingTooltip
data.value: 新しい XMA オーディオデコーダーの使用を有効にします

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_AudioXmpVolumeSettingTooltip
data.value: ゲームが設定されていない場合のデフォルトの音楽音量

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayFullscreenSettingTooltip
data.value: 有効な場合はエミュレータを全画面表示で開きます

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayInternalResolutionSettingTooltip
data.value: Allows the game that support different resolutions to be rendered in specific resolution NOTE: The game has to actually support the resolution for this to work. 1280x720 will work in pretty much every game.

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayCustomInternalResolutionHeightSettingText
data.value: 内部表示解像度の高さ

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayLetterboxSettingTooltip
data.value: 黒い延べ棒 を有効にします(文字ボックス/ピラーボックス)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayWidescreenSettingTooltip
data.value: Toggles between 16:9 and 4:3 aspect ratio NOTE: Resolutions below 1280x720 run at 4:3 aspect ratio

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayVSyncSettingTooltip
data.value: 垂直同期を有効にする

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayFramerateLimitSettingTooltip
data.value: Maximum frames per second Defaults to 60 when set to 0 and VSYNC is enabled 0 = Unlimited Frames

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsD3D12VRRSettingText
data.value: 可変リフレッシュレート (Direct3D 12)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsD3D12VRRSettingTooltip
data.value: 画面の引き裂きと可変リフレッシュ率

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsD3D12RenderTargetPathSettingTooltip
data.value: RTV (速度推奨) ROV 別名ラスタライズ順序付きビュー (利用可能な場合によっては高い精度を実現する場合があります)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsD3D12QueuePrioritySettingTooltip
data.value: - Normal - High (Default, recommended for speed) - Global Realtime (AdministratorとしてXenia/Xenia Managerを実行する必要があります)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanRenderTargetPathSettingTooltip
data.value: - FBO (Speed に推奨) - FSI (可能な場合によっては高精度にすることもあります)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanAllowPresentModeIntermediateSettingTooltip
data.value: Highest priority present mode Allows the immediate presentation mode, offering the lowest latency with the possibility of screen tearing in certain cases and variable refresh rate NOTE: If this doesn't work, try the other 2 present modes

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanAllowPresentModeMailboxSettingText
data.value: 現在モードのメールボックス (Vulkan)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanAllowPresentModeMailboxSettingTooltip
data.value: Middle priority present mode Allows the mailbox presentation mode (2nd priority), offering low latency without the possibility of tearing NOTE: If this doesn't work, try FIFO Relaxed present mode

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanAllowPresentModeFifoRelaxedSettingText
data.value: 現在モードFIFOリラックスした (Vulkan)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsVulkanAllowPresentModeFifoRelaxedSettingTooltip
data.value: Lowest priority present mode Allows the relaxed first-in first-out presentation mode, which causes waiting for host display vertical sync, but may present with tearing if frames don't meet the host display refresh rate

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsReadbackResolveSettingTooltip
data.value: Read render-to-texture results on the CPU This may be needed in some games, but causes mid-frame synchronization, so it has a huge performance impact

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsDrawResolutionScaleSettingTooltip
data.value: Integer pixel width scale used for scaling the rendering resolution opaquely to the game 1, 2 and 3 are supported, though in the documentation, this value can go to 7 (8960x5040) If set to 2, render resolution goes from 720p to 1440p, if set to 3 to 4k... NOTE: Various effects and parts of game rendering pipelines may work incorrectly

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsAntiAliasingSettingTooltip
data.value: Post-processing anti-aliasing effect to apply to the image output of the game Heavily recommended when AMD FidelityFX Contrast Adaptive Sharpening or Super Resolution 1.0 is active - FXAA (NVIDIA Fast Approximate Anti-Aliasing 3.11, normal quality preset) - FXAA Extreme (NVIDIA Fast Approximate Anti-Aliasing 3.11, extreme quality preset)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsScalingSharpeningSettingText
data.value: 拡大縮小とシャープニング

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsScalingSharpeningSettingTooltip
data.value: Post-processing effect to use for resampling and/or sharpening of the final display output - Bilinear (Original image at 1:1, simple bilinear stretching for resampling) - FidelityFX CAS (Use AMD FidelityFX Contrast Adaptive Sharpening (CAS) for sharpening at scaling factors of up to 2x2, with additional bilinear stretching for larger factors) - AMD FSR (Use AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 1.0 (FSR) for highest-quality upscaling, or AMD FidelityFX Contrast Adaptive Sharpening for sharpening while not scaling or downsampling) NOTE: For scaling by factors of more than 2x2, multiple FSR passes are done

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsFSRSharpnessReductionSettingTooltip
data.value: Sharpness reduction for AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 1.0 (FSR), in stops (Lower is sharper)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsCASAdditionalSharpnessSettingTooltip
data.value: AMD FidelityFX コントラスト適応シャープニング (CAS) (Higher is sharper)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsFSRMaxUpsamlingPassesSettingText
data.value: FSR最大アップサンプリングパス

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsFSRMaxUpsamlingPassesSettingTooltip
data.value: Maximum number of upsampling passes performed in AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 1.0 (FSR) before falling back to bilinear stretching after the final pass Each pass upscales only to up to 2x2 the previous size If the game outputs a 1280x720 image, 1 pass will upscale it to up to 2560x1440 (below 4K), after 2 passes it will be upscaled to a maximum of 5120x2880 (including 3840x2160 for 4K)... This variable has no effect if the display resolution isn't very high, but may be reduced on resolutions like 4K or 8K in case the performance impact of multiple FSR upsampling passes is too high, or if softer edges are desired 1 - 4, 4 is the maximum internally supported by Xenia

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsPostProcessDitherSettingText
data.value: ポストプロセス ディザー

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsPostProcessDitherSettingTooltip
data.value: Dither the final image output from the internal precision to 8 bits per channel so gradients are smoother On a 10bpc display, the lower 2 bits will still be kept, but noise will be added to them Disabling may be recommended for 10bpc, but it depends on the 10bpc displaying capabilities of the actual display used

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsAllowInvalidFetchConstantsSettingText
data.value: 無効なフェッチ定数を許可する

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsAllowInvalidFetchConstantsSettingTooltip
data.value: Allow texture and vertex fetch constants with invalid type Generally unsafe because the constant may contain completely invalid values, but may be used to bypass fetch constant type errors in certain games until the real reason why they're invalid is found

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsGammaRenderTargetAsSRgbSettingText
data.value: ガンマレンダリングターゲットをsRGBとする

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsGammaRenderTargetAsSRgbSettingTooltip
data.value: When the host can't write piecewise linear gamma directly with correct blending, use sRGB output on the host for conceptually correct blending in linear color space while having slightly different precision distribution in the render target and severely incorrect values if the game accesses the resulting colors directly as raw data

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsUseFuzzyAlphaEpsilonSettingText
data.value: ファジーアルファイプシロン

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GraphicsUseFuzzyAlphaEpsilonSettingTooltip
data.value: NVIDIAグラフィックスカードでのちらつきを防ぐためにアルファ値とおおよその比較を使用します

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayQueryOcclusionFakeSampleCountLowerSettingText
data.value: クエリオクルージョン偽サンプル数 (低閾値)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayQueryOcclusionFakeSampleCountLowerSettingTooltip
data.value: If set to -1 no sample counts are written, games may hang Else, the sample count of every tile will be incremented on every EVENT_WRITE_ZPD by this number Setting this to 0 means everything is reported as occluded

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayQueryOcclusionFakeSampleCountUpperSettingText
data.value: クエリオクルージョン偽サンプル数 (上限しきい値)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_DisplayQueryOcclusionFakeSampleCountUpperSettingTooltip
data.value: query_oclusion_sample_lower_threshold query_oclusion_sample_lower_threshold を -1 に設定すると、この値は無視されます。

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralAllowPluginsSettingText
data.value: プラグインを許可する

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralAllowPluginsSettingTooltip
data.value: Allows loading of plugins/trainers from plugins\title_id\plugin.xex Plugin are homebrew xex modules which can be used for making mods NOTE: This feature is experimental

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralDiscordSettingTooltip
data.value: Discordであなたのアクティビティを表示する

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralApplyPatchesSettingTooltip
data.value: Enables custom patching functionality If disabled, game patches like 60FPS patch won't work

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralLicenseMaskSettingTooltip
data.value: - ライセンスなし - 最初のライセンス (一般的に Xbox Live Arcade タイトルのフルバージョンライセンス) - すべてのライセンス (有効になっているライセンスはすべて有効になっています) しかし未定義の行動につながる可能性があります)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralApplyTitleUpdatesSettingTooltip
data.value: タイトルアップデートの適用を有効にする

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralShowAchievementNotificationSettingTooltip
data.value: 画面に実績通知を表示する

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralUserCountrySettingTooltip
data.value: 国を変更するために使用されます（ゲームは言語を変更するために使用できます）

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_GeneralUserLanguageSettingTooltip
data.value: ゲーム内で言語を変更するために使用されます（サポートされている場合）

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputHidSettingTooltip
data.value: - Any (default) - SDL2 (needed for non-XInput controllers) - XInput (XInput controllers) - Winkey (keyboard)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputKeyboardModeSettingTooltip
data.value: - 無効化 - 有効化 - パススルー（コントローラーが接続されている必要があります）

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputKeyboardUserIndexSettingText
data.value: キーボードユーザーインデックス

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputKeyboardUserIndexSettingTooltip
data.value: キーボードがエミュレートするコントローラポート

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputLeftStickDeadzoneSettingText
data.value: 左スティックのデッドゾーン

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputLeftStickDeadzoneSettingTooltip
data.value: 左スティックのデッドゾーンレベルを設定します。

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputRightStickDeadzoneSettingText
data.value: 右スティックデッドゾーン

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputRightStickDeadzoneSettingTooltip
data.value: 右スティックのデッドゾーンレベルを定義します

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputControllerHotkeysSettingText
data.value: コントローラーのホットキー

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputControllerHotkeysSettingTooltip
data.value: XboxとPSコントローラーのホットキー 注：ゲームプレイを妨げることができます

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputControllerVibrationSettingText
data.value: コントローラーの振動

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputControllerVibrationSettingTooltip
data.value: コントローラーの振動を切り替える

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_StorageMountCacheSettingTooltip
data.value: Enable cache mount Can fix some games

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_StorageMountScratchSettingText
data.value: スクラッチをマウント

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_StorageMountScratchSettingTooltip
data.value: スクラッチマウントを有効化

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksCommandLineSettingTooltip
data.value: ゲストに提供する追加のコマンドラインを指定してください

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksProtectZeroSettingTooltip
data.value: ゼロページを - オン (デフォルト) - オフ (特定のゲームに必要なハック)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksBreakOnUnimplementedInstructionsSettingText
data.value: 実装されていない手順を中断する

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksBreakOnUnimplementedInstructionsSettingTooltip
data.value: 未実装の PowerPC 命令が - オン (デフォルト) - オフ (ハック) (ハック) 特定のゲームに必要)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksClearGpuCacheSettingText
data.value: GPU キャッシュをクリア

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksClearGpuCacheSettingTooltip
data.value: Refresh the state of memory pages to enable gpu written data - On (worsens performance, but can help reduce visual anomalies like polygon explosions or corrupted textures) - Off (default)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksDisableContextPromotionSettingText
data.value: コンテキストプロモーションを無効にする

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksDisableContextPromotionSettingTooltip
data.value: コンテキストプロモーションの最適化を無効にする これは一部のスポーツゲームで必要な場合がありますが、パフォーマンスを低下させます

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksScribbleHeapSettingTooltip
data.value: 割り当てられたすべてのヒープメモリに0xCDをScribble これは、一部のゲームでReadback Resolveの代替として使用できます。

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_HacksDisassembleFunctionsSettingTooltip
data.value: Disassemble functions during generation This can be used as an alternative to Readback Resolve in some games

data.name: OpenFileDialog_SelectGamePatchTitle
data.value: ゲームパッチファイルを選択

data.name: MessageBox_DeleteSaveGameText
data.value: Do you want to delete the save file for {0}?

data.name: MessageBox_SuccessDeleteSaveGameText
data.value: The save game for {0} has been successfully deleted.

data.name: SettingsPage_AutomaticSaveBackupTooltip
data.value: Enable this option to automatically back up save files to the Backup folder next to Xenia Manager each time Xenia Manager is closed

data.name: SettingsPage_ProfileSlotTooltip
data.value: Select the profile slot whose save files will be automatically backed up each time you exit Xenia

data.name: AboutPage_AppDescription
data.value: A comprehensive management tool for Xenia Xbox 360 emulator. Easily install, update, and manage different versions of Xenia emulator with an intuitive interface.

data.name: AboutPage_LicenseText
data.value: This software is licensed under the BSD-3-Clause License.

data.name: MessageBox_SuccessExportLogsText
data.value: Xenia {0} log file has been exported to Desktop.

data.name: MessageBox_SuccessUpdateGameControllerDatabaseText
data.value: Successfully updated Xenia {0} game controller database.

data.name: SnackbarPresenter_CopiedImageText
data.value: Image has been copied to your clipboard

data.name: SnackbarPresenter_XeniaManagerUpdateAvailableTitle
data.value: Xenia Manager has a new update

data.name: InfoBar_ManagerUpdatesAvailableText
data.value: There is a newer version of Xenia Manager.

data.name: InfoBar_ManagerNoUpdatesAvailableText
data.value: You are currently on the latest version of Xenia Manager.

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_NvidiaVSyncSettingTooltip
data.value: Enable Vertical Sync from NVIDIA Control Panel Turn off Xenia's Vertical Sync if you plan on using this one - Default (Use the 3D application settings) - Force Off - Allows GPU to render unconstrained by refresh rate, but it can cause screen tearing - Force On - Limits the GPU Render rate to the max refresh rate of the monitor and avoids tearing - 1/2 Refresh Rate - Limits the GPU render rate to half the monitor’s refresh rate - 1/3 Refresh Rate - Limits the GPU render rate to one-third the monitor’s refresh rate - 1/4 Refresh Rate - Limits the GPU render rate to one-fourth the monitor’s refresh rate - Adaptive (Fast Sync) - Limits the GPU Render rate similar to On, but if render rate drops it will allow screen tearing

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_NvidiaFramerateLimitSettingTooltip
data.value: Maximum frames per second Make sure Xenia's Framerate Limiter is set to 0 for this to work

data.name: SettingsPage_ShowLoadingScreenTooltip
data.value: If enabled, game's background will be shown while the emulator is launching

data.name: AboutPage_UseExperimentalBuildTooltip
data.value: Enable to receive experimental feature updates

data.name: GameDetailsEditor_CompatibilityPagePlaceholderText
data.value: Enter URL to the game's compatibility page

data.name: GameDetailsEditor_InfobarAutomaticDetectionText
data.value: Title ID and Media ID are automatically detected from the game file and cannot be modified.

data.name: MessageBox_AdministratorRequiredText
data.value: "Unified content folder" requires administrative rights. Please run app as administrator or disable the option to be able to install Xenia.

data.name: ManagePage_UnifiedContentFolderTooltip
data.value: Makes all Xenia versions have same content folder NOTE: This requires Xenia Manager to be run as Administrator while installing Xenia

data.name: MessageBox_SuccessDeleteGameContentText
data.value: The content file {0} for {1} has been successfully deleted.

data.name: MessageBox_DeleteGameContentText
data.value: Do you want to delete the selected content for {0}?

data.name: SettingsPage_AutoEmulatorUpdateTooltip
data.value: When enabled, the emulator will update in the background NOTE: You can't use Xenia during the update process

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookAutoaimSettingTooltip
data.value: Disable autoaim in games that support it

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookAimTurnDistanceSettingTooltip
data.value: Distance crosshair can move in aim-mode before turning the camera [0 - 1]

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookMousehookFovSensitivitySettingTooltip
data.value: Mouse scale when FOV is lowered (Currently for Call of Duty, Dead Rising, Red Dead Redemption and UE3 Games)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookMousehookSensitivitySettingTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to change the mouse sensitivity

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookMousehookMenuSensitivitySettingTooltip
data.value: (GoldenEye/Saints Row 1) Mouse sensitivity when in menus

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookGoldenEyeDebugMenuSettingTooltip
data.value: Enables the debug menu, accessible with LB/1

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookGunSwaySettingTooltip
data.value: (GoldenEye/Perfect Dark) Enable gun sway as camera is turned

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookRdrSnappyWheelSettingTooltip
data.value: (Red Dead Redemption) Snaps the Weapon Wheel in 45 degree increments

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookGoldenEyeRemoveBlurSettingTooltip
data.value: Removes low-res blur when in classic-graphics mode

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookRdrTurboGallopHorseSettingTooltip
data.value: Enables turbo galloping for horses and coaches in Red Dead Redemption (Bound to Modifier same as Turbo sprint)

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookSr2BetterDriveCamSettingTooltip
data.value: Unties X rotation from vehicles when auto-centering is disabled akin to GTA IV

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookSr2BetterHandbrakeCamSettingTooltip
data.value: Unties X rotation from vehicles when handbraking akin to Saints Row 1

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_UserInputMousehookSr2HoldFineAimSettingTooltip
data.value: Switches fine aim (ADS) from a toggle to hold press

data.name: ManagePage_RedownloadTooltip
data.value: Redownloads Xenia Useful is something is not working

data.name: LibraryGameButton_SwitchToXeniaTooltip
data.value: Changes the Xenia version used by the game to Xenia {0}

data.name: MessageBox_DeleteXeniaText
data.value: Do you want to uninstall Xenia {0}? This will remove all save files and updates alongside the emulator.

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ConfigureMousehookControlsTooltip
data.value: Configure key bindings used by {0} in Xenia Mousehook

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ViewInstalledContentTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to see what's installed in {0} content folder and to export save files

data.name: LibraryGameButton_InstallPatchesTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to install locally available patch file

data.name: LibraryGameButton_DownloadPatchesTooltip
data.value: Downloads and installs a patch file from the game patches repository

data.name: LibraryGameButton_AddAdditionalPatchesTooltip
data.value: Add additional patches to the existing patch file from another local file Useful if you have a patch file that is not in game-patches repository

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ConfigurePatchesTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to enable/disable installed game patches

data.name: LibraryGameButton_RemovePatchesTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to remove the installed game patches

data.name: LibraryGameButton_SteamShortcutTooltip
data.value: This will add a shortcut to every Steam account that is logged in on the users computer

data.name: LibraryGameButton_ChangeGamePathTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to change the location of {0} Useful if the game has been moved to a different location

data.name: LibraryGameButton_RemoveGameHeaderTooltip
data.value: Deletes the game from Xenia Manager

data.name: LibraryPage_DisplayHideOptionsTooltip
data.value: Show/Hide things like game title or compatibility rating on box arts

data.name: LibraryPage_DisplayGameTitleTooltip
data.value: Show/Hide game title on game's box art

data.name: LibraryPage_DisplayGameCompatibilityRatingTooltip
data.value: Show/Hide game's compatibility rating on box art

data.name: LibraryPage_LibraryViewChangerTooltip
data.value: Changes between Grid and List view for Library

data.name: LibraryPage_ScanDirectoryTooltip
data.value: Scans the selected directory for games Check Wiki for more info on how to use this

data.name: LibraryPage_AddGameTooltip
data.value: Opens file dialog where user selects the game to be added into Xenia Manager

data.name: ManagePage_EmulatorManagementHeaderTooltip
data.value: Install and manage different Xenia emulator versions

data.name: ManagePage_ConfigurationHeaderTooltip
data.value: Customize emulator behavior and file organization

data.name: ManagePage_ExportLogFileTooltip
data.value: Allows the user to export Xenia logs to desktop Useful if the user is experiencing crashes and wants to ask for help over on Xenia's Discord Server

data.name: ManagePage_UpdateGameControllerDatabaseTooltip
data.value: Updates the SDL Game Controller Database used by Xenia

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_ResetSettingsButtonTooltip
data.value: Copies all of the settings from the default configuration file to the currently selected game configuration This only reads the settings from the default profile into the UI and it doesn't save the changes

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_OptimizeSettingsButtonTooltip
data.value: Looks up for the optimized settings in the repository and applies them To save the changes, press the "Save Changes" button

data.name: XeniaSettingsPage_OpenInEditorButtonTooltip
data.value: Opens the selected profile's configuration file in a text editor Please close the text editor when you're done with the changes This is intended for advanced users

data.name: ContentViewer_OpenFolderButtonTooltip
data.value: Opens the selected content folder in Windows Explorer

data.name: ContentViewer_DeleteButtonTooltip
data.value: Deletes the item selected in the TreeView

data.name: ContentViewer_ExportSavesButtonTooltip
data.value: Exports the save files into a zip folder

data.name: ContentViewer_ImportSavesButtonTooltip
data.value: Imports the save game (Has to have specific folder structure, similar to game saves found on Xenia's game-saves repository)

data.value: Do you want to delete currently selected gamer profile ({0})?
